channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18493] Add display escape for CR/LF to Hive CLI and Beeline
item.description: Add optional display escaping of carriage return and line feed so row output remains one line.
item.summary: Add display escape for CR/LF to Hive CLI and Beeline

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
